mdRecord.dcterms:title: Annual report of the President and Directors to the stockholders of the Virginia and Tennessee Rail Road Company
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Home Library of the Garnetts of Elmwood (University of Virginia)
Virginia and Tennessee Railroad Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Folding map issued with 9th report, 1856, has title: Map & profile of the Virginia & Tennessee Rail Road / prepared by W.W. Blackford, 1856, Lith. of Ritchie & Dunnavant, Richmond.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Folding map from 9th annual report, 1856, has been unfolded and filed in Map Cabinet. Thomas Streeter Railroad Collection. Gift of Thomas W. Streeter.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: TA24 .V83 C7 1848b no.3-5, 8-9: Third-fifth & eighth-ninth of twenty-eight titles in volume with spine title "Pamphlets: Va. R.R. guage questions, Wheeling bridge &c." From the Garnett Family Library of Elmwood. Gift of Mrs. J. Clayton Mitchell. Search by call number or keyword to retrieve all titles in the volume.
